meanings.definition: To play shinney, a game resembling hockey.
meanings.sent1: The kids were shinneying on the frozen pond.
meanings.sent2: Every winter, we enjoy shinneying with our friends.
meanings.sent3: Instead of studying, they were shinneying in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The dancers were shinneying across the stage with grace.
meanings.sent5: The birds were shinneying through the trees, their wings fluttering.

meanings.sent1: After school, they always have a fun shinneying session.
meanings.sent2: Shinneying is a popular pastime in our neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The shinneying tournament brought the whole community together.
meanings.sent4: The shinneying equipment was neatly stored in the shed.
meanings.sent5: The sound of shinneying echoed through the park on weekends.

meanings.sent1: The squirrel was shinneying up the tree to escape the dog.
meanings.sent2: She was shinneying through the crowd to catch the bus.
meanings.sent3: The cat was shinneying around the house, chasing shadows.
meanings.sent4: The river was shinneying down the mountainside after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The car was shinneying along the highway, passing other vehicles.
